TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicQueryStringParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IWhereParametersProvider
Public Class DynamicQueryStringParameter Inherits Parameter Implements IWhereParametersProvider
type DynamicQueryStringParameter = class inherit Parameter interface IWhereParametersProvider

summary.span: 通过检索查询字符串值，自动生成用于为数据源控件创建 子句的参数集合。

span.span: Automatically generates a collection of parameters that is used to create the clause for the data source control by retrieving query string values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由使用 ASP.NET 动态数据功能的页面使用。The class is used by pages that are using ASP.NET Dynamic Data features. 类将 通过检索查询字符串值为表的主键、外键和布尔值列生成对象集合。The class will generate a collection of objects for the primary keys, foreign keys, and Boolean columns of a table by retrieving query string values. 对于主键， 无需提供任何其他参数即可添加对象。For primary keys, you can simply add a object without supplying any other parameters. 动态数据将为主键或键生成参数。Dynamic Data will generate the parameters for the primary key or keys. 对于外键或布尔值列，必须将 属性设置为要筛选的列的名称。For foreign keys or Boolean columns, you must set the property to the name of the column you want to filter. 若要使用 类，必须将 控件添加到页面，并且必须 通过使用方法向控件注册数据绑定控件 。In order to use the class, you must add a control to the page and you must register the data-bound control with the control by using the method. 请参阅此功能的运行时代码示例： [运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 控件中显示数据时将对象用作筛选器 。The following example shows how to use the object as filter when displaying data in a control. 控件包含一个 对象，该对象创建一个链接，该链接使用外键值设置查询字符串值。The control contains a object that creates a link that sets the query string value by using the foreign key value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicQueryStringParameter/VB/Default.aspx#1)]

param.span: 有关 HTTP 请求的信息。

span.span: The control the parameter is bound to.

summary.span: 在所有情况下均引发 异常。

span.span: Throws an exception in all cases.

returns.span: 在所有情况下均引发 异常。

span.span: Throws an exception in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该 方法由 ASP.NET 调用，则在所有情况下都会引发 "" 异常。If the method is invoked by ASP.NET, it throws an T:System.InvalidOperationException exception in all cases. 出现这种情况是因为满足以下条件之一：This happens because one of the following conditions are met: - 该页不包含 控件。The page does not contain a control. - 数据绑定控件未注册以供 控件使用。The data-bound control is not registered for use by the control.

abstract member GetWhereParameters : System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource -> seq<System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> override this.GetWhereParameters : System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicDataSource -> seq<System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

summary.span: 返回 对象的集合，这些对象是通过检索查询字符串值，自动为表列生成的。

span.span: Returns a collection of objects that are automatically generated for the columns of a table by retrieving query string values.

returns.span: 一个通过检索查询字符串值，自动为表列生成的参数的集合

span.span: A collection of parameters that are automatically generated for the columns of a table by retrieving query string values

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类将 通过检索查询字符串值为表的主键、外键和布尔值列生成对象集合。The class will generate a collection of objects for the primary keys, foreign keys and Boolean columns of a table by retrieving query string values.
